scripts.start: npm run dev & npm run watch
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run build:campaign && npm run build:transactional
scripts.build:campaign: mjml src/campaigns/*.mjml -o ./dist/campaigns/ --config.minify true --config.fonts '{}' -l strict && npm run prepare:intercom
scripts.prep: npm run clean && npm run ensureDir
scripts.dev: npm run prep && mjml -w src/transactional/*.mjml src/transactional/**/*.mjml src/campaigns/*.mjml -o ./dist --config.minify true -l strict
scripts.prepare:intercom:
sed -i '' -e 's/<style type="text\/css">/<style type="text\/css" data-premailer="ignore">/g' ./dist/campaigns/*.html && sed -i '' -e 's/\/\* inline-styles \*\//<\/style>\
<style type="text\/css">/g' ./dist/campaigns/*.html
